title: Musculoskeletal Health, Injury, and Disease
description: An overview of the musculoskeletal system from a bioengineering perspective. Health, injury, disease of bone, cartilage, tendon, ligament, meniscus, synovium, intervertebral disc, skeletal muscle, peripheral nerve. Mechanisms and models underlying current and future therapies. Prerequisites: graduate standing or consent of instructor. (S)
